Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Petit Palace Londres, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, steps from El Oso y el Madrono and Puerta del Sol. This hotel is close to Plaza Mayor and Prado Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 57 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and plasma televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a computer station, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Petit Palace Londres, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, steps from El Oso y el Madrono and Puerta del Sol. This hotel is close to Plaza Mayor and Prado Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

El Oso y el Madrono - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Puerta del Sol - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Convent de las Descalzas Reales - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Joy Madrid - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Plaza de Callao - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
San Fernando Royal Academy of Fine Arts - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Mosaic International Institute - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza Mayor - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Teatro Caser Calderon de Madrid - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Plaza de Isabel II - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Mercado de San Miguel - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Santa Ana Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Teatro Espanol - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Royal Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Lope de Vega Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Petit Palace Londres is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 12.8 km / 7.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
